snippet: General Motors is recalling almost 118,000 of its 2013-14 model vehicles including the Chevrolet Tahoe and Cadillac Escalade.
abstract: General Motors is recalling almost 118,000 of its 2013-14 models because they may stall or fail to start; action includes almost 98,000 vehicles in the United States.
lead_paragraph: General Motors is recalling almost 118,000 of its 2013-14 model vehicles including the Chevrolet Tahoe and Cadillac Escalade.

headline.main: G.M. Recalls More Cars Over Possible Stalling
headline.print_headline: G.M. Recalls More Cars Over Possible Stalling
